plot: Taking even themselves by surprise, a biologist with the Army Corps of Engineers, a satirist and a bunch of boaters stand up to the authorities, and change the course of history for an embattled environmental landmark.
title: Heather and Goliath
plot_es: Taking even themselves by surprise, a biologist with the Army Corps of Engineers, a satirist and a bunch of boaters stand up to the authorities, and change the course of history for an embattled environmental landmark.
plot_en: Taking even themselves by surprise, a biologist with the Army Corps of Engineers, a satirist and a bunch of boaters stand up to the authorities, and change the course of history for an embattled environmental landmark.
